name: WarpRanger
description: Story so far: In 2099 Before the next millennium arrives,a young red robotic hero named WarpRanger was born. He was created by Dr.tarks, an expert of building robots ,who thinks WarpRanger protect the Earth. Until..meanwhile in the planet name ToHoNa numer 553, a dark shadow life form named Shadic planed to take over the Earth`s history timeline then let everything that made from the past disappear forever. So Shadic built his yellow pointy minions then send them to different timelines. He also sent 5 bosses to search for WarpRanger and defeat it too. Back into earth, 4 hours later, everything starts vanishing! Even Dr.tarks is vanishing too! Until he turn into nothingness, he said "WarpRanger, your our only hope to turn time back around! Here,take this time badge. This thing will send you into time a defeat the other bosses to turn into a correct timeline. Good luck WarpRanger, and re..mem..ber, time... is... among... us..." And so the adventure begins when WarpRanger have to go back in time and save the Earth`s history timeline before the whole galaxy dose not exists forever!
